text: The Afghanistan national futsal team represents Afghanistan in international futsal. In 2024 they competed for the AFC Futsal Championship and the 2024 FIFA Futsal World Cup for the first time. ==Tournaments== ===FIFA Futsal World Cup=== Year Round Pld W D* L GS GA 1989 Did not enter
